timeline.message:
* Adding binary checksum to workflow client options

* Add binary checksum to respond task completed and state machines also
adding default value

timeline.bodyText: Why not an empty string as it is now?
timeline.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText:
Having some value could potentially be useful in case when someone just added their own binary checksum and wants to roll back.
I'm okay changing it to empty string if you prefer it.
replies.author: vitarb

timeline.bodyText: I would make the default null and not call this method if it is not set.
timeline.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText:
I did that initially, but didn't like the extra if statement and decided to add a default.
Should we have an empty string default instead as you've suggested above?
replies.author: vitarb

replies.bodyText: I've changed it to empty string by default, let me know if you think that's sufficient.
replies.author: vitarb

timeline.bodyText: Does test verify that it was indeed added to the history?
timeline.author: mfateev

replies.bodyText: I've added a separate test for it in the WorkflowTest, this one just adds it because identity was there already.
replies.author: vitarb

timeline.message:
* Adding binary checksum to workflow client options

* Add binary checksum to respond task completed and state machines also
adding default value
Add a test for binary checksum and default to empty string
Add a test for binary checksum and default to empty string
